description: The JupyterLab IDE with Python and the deep-learning framework TensorFlow.

label: Rstudio-sparkr

label: Metabase

description: NoSQL document-oriented database that stores JSON-like documents with dynamic schemas.

label: Neo4j
description: Neo4j is a graph database management system. It's an ACID-compliant transactional database with native graph storage.

label: Nocodb

label: OpenRefine
description: OpenRefine (previously Google Refine) is a powerful tool for working with messy data, cleaning it; transforming it from one format into another; and extending it with web services and external data.

label: Trino

label: ArgoCd
